title: Tamana, Kumamoto
text:
is a <a href="Cities%20of%20Japan">city</a> located in <a href="Kumamoto%20Prefecture">Kumamoto Prefecture</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. The city was founded on April 1, 1954. As of the October 3, 2005 merger (but with 2008 population estimates), the city has an estimated <a href="population">population</a> of 70,530 and a <a href="population%20density">population density</a> of 462 persons per km². The total area is 152.55 km².
On October 3, 2005, the towns of <a href="Taimei%2C%20Kumamoto">Taimei</a>, <a href="Tensui%2C%20Kumamoto">Tensui</a> and <a href="Yokoshima%2C%20Kumamoto">Yokoshima</a> (all from <a href="Tamana%20District%2C%20Kumamoto">Tamana District</a>) were merged into Tamana.
